clusters.neutral_headline: Texas Sues Wall Street Firms Over Alleged Anti-Coal Practices

items.title: Texas suit alleging anti-coal “cartel” of top Wall Street firms could reshape ESG

ai_summary: Texas filed a lawsuit against major financial institutions, alleging anti-coal practices.
The suit claims these firms formed a "cartel" to limit investments in the coal industry.
Texas argues these actions violate antitrust laws and harm the state's economy.
The case could significantly impact Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) investing.
The outcome may reshape how financial institutions approach energy investments.

This shift signals a long-term strategy for AI independence.
